fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Business and Industry, Environment, Single market, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Climate Action
eu_initiatives:
•    Implementation of the Construction Products Regulation (COD/2008/0098) (Repeal Directive 89/106/EEC);  
•    ECS attends several CEN and EOTA WGs and events dedicated to stakeholders, held seminars and speaches on SMEs and the CPR. ECS is actively involved in several CEN and EOTA technical groups as well as in the EOTA Stakeholder Advisory Group.
organisation_name: European Engineered Construction Systems Association e. V. (ECS)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
ECS is member of 
•    DAfStb – Deutscher Ausschuss für Stahlbeton (German Committee for Structural Concrete) http://www.dafstb.de 
•    DBV - Deutscher Beton- und Bautechnik-Verein 
(German Society for Concrete and Construction Technology) 
http://www.betonverein.de 
•    fib  - Fédération Intérnational du Béton http://www.fib-international.org 
•    ISB – Institut für Stahlbetonbewehrung e.V. http://www.isb-ev.de 
•    BIBM - Bureau International du Béton Manufacturé http://www.bibm.eu 
and indirectly member of 
•    Constructions Products Europe CPE  http://www.construction-products.eu
